CARDINAL . NORP The public prosecutor is also deprived of jurisdiction with regard to offences alleged against members of the security forces in the state of emergency region . Decree no . CARDINAL , LAW , provides that all security forces under the command of the regional governor ( see paragraph CARDINAL above ) shall be subject , in respect of acts performed in the course of their duties , to the PERSON on the Prosecution of Civil Servants .
